subject: Re: [Radiance-general] Full workshop ahead!
body:
I second that!



Chris

100 Broadway, 23rd Floor

New York, NY 10005



Sent: Monday, September 03, 2012 9:04 PM
To: Radiance general discussion


Hi Greg (& Nicolas),



Is there a possibility to webcast the workshop similar to what you did
last year?



Regards,

Mostapha



On Mon, Sep 3, 2012 at 9:58 AM, Gregory J. Ward <gregoryjward at gmail.com>
wrote:

P.S.  Forgot to include the workshop web page in case you don't have it
handy:

http://www.radiance-online.org/radiance-workshop11/

The deadline for registration has officially passed, though you can ask
Nicolas for special permission if you have extenuating circumstances.  I
understand there are about 50 registrants at this point, and we may be
reaching venue capacity as well!
